mapper.insert: insert into user(`authentication_string`, `display_name`, `email`, `phone_number`, `condition`, `authority`, `surname`, `name`, `age`, `gender`, `created_by`, `creation_time`, `updated_by`, `last_updated_time`, `revision`) values (MD5(#{entity.authenticationString}), #{entity.displayName}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.condition}, #{entity.authority}, #{entity.surname}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.gender}, #{entity.createdBy}, now(), #{entity.updatedBy}, now(), 0);
mapper.update:
update user u
u.`authentication_string` = MD5(#{entity.authenticationString}),
u.`display_name` = #{entity.displayName},
u.`email` = #{entity.email},
u.`condition` = #{entity.condition},
u.`authority` = #{entity.authority},
u.`surname` = #{entity.surname},
u.`name` = #{entity.name},
u.`age` = #{entity.age},
u.`gender` = #{entity.gender},
u.`updated_by` = #{entity.updatedBy},
u.`last_updated_time` = now(), u.`revision` = (1 + u.`revision`) % 2147483647,
where u.`id` = #{id}
mapper.select: select u.`id`, u.`display_name`, u.`email`, u.`phone_number`, u.`condition`, u.`authority`, u.`surname`, u.`name`, u.`age`, u.`gender`, u.`created_by`, u.`creation_time`, u.`updated_by`, u.`last_updated_time`, u.`revision` from user u where u.`id` = #{id};
select u.`id`, u.`display_name`, u.`authority` from user u, token_access_record t where t.token = #{token} and u.id = t.id and t.`used_time` > SUBDATE(NOW(), 7)
mapper.insert: insert into user(authentication_string, display_name, email) values (MD5(#{entity.authenticationString}), #{entity.displayName}, #{entity.email});
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where email = #{email} || email_normal = concat(substring_index(substring_index(#{email}, '@', 1), '+', 1), '@', substring_index(#{email}, '@', -1));
